banner.title: Dynamic Vault
banner.subtitle: Interactive digital encyclopedia for heritage conservation
banner.description: Preserving and sharing Da Nang's rich cultural heritage through advanced technology, community collaboration, and intelligent content management.

recentPosts.title: Recent Posts
recentPosts.subtitle: Discover new shares from the community

contribute.title: Contribute to the community
contribute.description: Share your stories and photos about Da Nang
contribute.callDescription: Each of your photos is a valuable piece that helps complete the cultural and historical picture of Da Nang. Share beautiful moments and unique perspectives of our heritage.

collection.title: Heritage Collection
collection.subtitle: Discover cultural beauty through each image

impact.title: The Meaning When You Contribute Photos
impact.subtitle: Each of your contributions is not just a photo, but a meaningful action that helps preserve and promote Da Nang's cultural heritage
impact.rememberRootsDesc: Help young generations understand and be proud of their hometown's history and culture
impact.preserveMemoriesDesc: Each photo is a story, a piece of history recorded forever
impact.connectCommunityDesc: Create connections between generations, between past and present
impact.preserveHeritageDesc: Contribute to preserving and promoting traditional cultural values
impact.inspireDesc: Awaken love for hometown and national pride
impact.promoteDesc: Bring Da Nang's image closer to friends everywhere
impact.quote: Every photo you share is a valuable piece in our collective history. Thank you for helping to preserve and promote Da Nang's cultural heritage.

footer.description: Da Nang Heritage Vault - Where we preserve and share the city's precious cultural values.

community.title: Da Nang Heritage Community
community.subtitle: Share photos, connect with the heritage-loving community

imageLibrary.title: Image Library
imageLibrary.searchPlaceholder: Search by title or year (e.g., Temple, 1995)...

compare.title: Featured Then & Now Images
compare.subtitle: Compare changes over time — data linked with Articles / Images

contributePage.title: Contribute Cultural Heritage Photos
contributePage.subtitle: Upload historical (old) images of Da Nang's cultural heritage — the system will analyze and suggest titles.
contributePage.uploadText: Click to select photo or drag and drop here
contributePage.note1: Only accept historical (old) photos of Da Nang's cultural heritage
contributePage.note2: Avoid blurry, too dark or too bright photos
contributePage.note3: Photos should clearly show the cultural heritage to contribute
contributePage.note4: AI will analyze better with photos having beautiful angles
contributePage.footerText: After analysis, you will be redirected to fill in detailed information

contributeInfo.title: Complete your contribution details
contributeInfo.subtitle: AI has analyzed and suggested category and title for your photo. Please add information to complete your contribution.
contributeInfo.altPlaceholder: Short description of the image content
contributeInfo.contentPlaceholder: Share what you know about this heritage...
contributeInfo.processPending: Status: Pending - Your contribution will be sent for review
contributeInfo.processReview: An admin will review and respond within 24-48 hours
contributeInfo.processEmail: You'll receive an email when your contribution is accepted or rejected

sidebar.noPostsYet: No posts in this category yet
